subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joakim Soria, a two-time All-Star at 26, is the Royals’ best hope for a turnaround, if they can just get him the ball with a lead.
snippet: Joakim Soria, a two-time All-Star at 26, is the Royals’ best hope for a turnaround, if they can just get him the ball with a lead.
